short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elegantly bookmark and organize your favorite video moments across YouTube, Vimeo, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timemark is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you bookmark and organize your favorite moments in YouTube and Vimeo videos with precision and ease.

Key Features:
✓ One-click timestamp bookmarking with exact time precision
✓ Clean, intuitive interface with dark mode support
✓ Organize bookmarks by date with powerful search functionality
✓ Works seamlessly with YouTube and Vimeo
✓ Fast, lightweight, and privacy-focused
✓ No account required - all data stored locally

Perfect for:
• Students marking important points in educational videos
• Researchers collecting video references
• Content creators organizing inspiration
• Music learners marking specific sections
• Anyone who wants to save and revisit specific video moments

How to Use:
1. Navigate to any YouTube or Vimeo video
2. Click the Timemark icon in your browser
3. Click "Save Moment" to bookmark the current timestamp
4. Access your bookmarks anytime through the extension
5. Search and organize your saved moments effortlessly

Privacy & Security:
• All bookmarks are stored locally in your browser
• No personal data collection
• No external servers or analytics
• Minimal permissions required
• Open source and transparent

Regular updates and improvements based on user feedback.
For support or feature requests, please contact us through the Chrome Web Store.
